memories.content: PixelFlasher-inspired enhancement completed: 24 new tools added (35â†’59 total). Phases 1-5 done. PR #3 on branch feat/advanced-android-tools.
Tool categories: device (11), app (6), file (6), flash (17), interaction (6), firmware (4), patching (5), root (4). Binary deps: payload-dumper-go, magiskboot (auto-downloaded).
Remaining PixelFlasher features not yet extracted: Play Integrity Fix (PIF) Manager, Package Manager (batch app ops), WiFi ADB Pairing, Backup Manager.
User prefers Gemini CLI for orchestration and research tasks when dealing with large codebases.
Architecture: Hybrid Orchestrator pattern - TypeScript for decision logic/safety, auto-downloaded binaries for heavy processing. Stock boot caching at ~/.android-debug-mcp/boot-cache/.
